body: Short of it is that Satori got used to protag barging in on her to bother her while she's working. Except he suddenly stops. To find out why, she pays him a visit and tries to read his mind. He lets slip that he and Koishi are hiding something from her, and she becomes determined to weaken protag enough that she can find out what they're hiding. She fails at this, but then finds out that they got her a present and knew it would be really difficult to make it a surprise since Satori can read minds.
